explanation: [0-0] The video is divided into two parts. The upper part is a cartoon animation, a pink cartoon figure sitting between yellow and purple flower pots with green plants in them. The little figure has a sad expression with its mouth open. The lower part shows a man wearing a red T-shirt and rainbow shorts, sitting on the tiles in front of a gray sofa.

[0-6] The cartoon figure at the top begins to cry, tears are blue streams gushing from its eyes and falling on the blue ground in front of it. The man below also starts to cry at the same time, two lines of blue cartoon tears streaming down his face. The cartoon figure keeps crying, more and more tears are shed, and more and more water accumulates on the ground. The man also continues to cry, with the cartoon tears becoming more copious and overflowing.
